visionSection.title: HITEK'S VISION
visionSection.mainStatement: Hitek's long-term goal is to become a world-leading software tool
visionSection.description: Hitek Software continuously researches new technologies every day to achieve the goal of becoming a world-leading software tool.

messageSection.title: CHAIRMAN'S MESSAGE
messageSection.mainGoal: HITEK'S LONG-TERM GOAL IS TO BECOME A WORLD-LEADING SOFTWARE COMPANY
paragraphs: Having the opportunity to work with many customers worldwide during the startup phase, I have accumulated extensive experience to understand customer needs in each country and each field they target.
I am building Hitek Software stronger every day with that experience.

Hitek Software is a collection of young, energetic talents always ready to explore and adapt to new technologies. Therefore, we are confident that with the strength of quickly updating new technologies and knowledge, we can satisfy our customers' requirements.

In addition to young human resources, we also have consultants who are fluent in foreign languages and have deep technology expertise, which helps eliminate language barriers between Hitek and foreign customers. This is also the formula that has allowed Hitek Software to approach and accompany many customers worldwide for over 5 years.

image.alt: Hitek Software Chairman - Tran Anh Khoi

messageSection.quote: Continuous innovation, continuous development - Leading the passionate young team to global reach

keyMembers.title: KEY MEMBERS

achievements.text: 10+ years of experience in mobile app/web development
5+ years of experience in team management and leadership
Main responsibility in progress management, planning for timeline, budget, and personnel
Managing remote international teams, planning personal development for employees
Experience working in international environments: Japan, Vietnam, Korea, Europe
7+ years of experience in software development and system design
2+ years of experience in IoT system design and implementation, prototype building
Participated in writing scientific technology articles in 2016
First prize in open source software competition 2015
Second prize in ACM/ICPC international programming competition 2014
Responsible for building and designing software system architecture, technical direction
Founder and Chairman of Rovi Digital Technology Investment Joint Stock Company (Rovi Group)
Founding shareholder and Board Member of Everyone Have Fun Technology Joint Stock Company
Former General Director of Thengroup Investment Joint Stock Company
Former Commercial Director of Everyone Have Fun Service Company Limited
Former Founder and operator of Affordable Phone chain system (2012)

us.title: About Us
us.description: Expert team, company culture and core values

description.text1: Discover the journey from startup with 5 engineers to global technology company
description.highlight: with mission to become world's leading software partner

introTexts: Hitek was established in 2018, a long enough journey for us to affirm our position in the current technology market.
Hitek's future goal is not only to be the best software development company in Vietnam, but also to be a world-leading software company!

items.title: Hitek Establishment
items.description: Hitek was established with only 5 software engineers, working freelance, focusing on web and mobile app development for Vietnamese market.

items.title: Going Global
items.description: First received software outsourcing contract for Korean market, Hitek changed business strategy to expand to foreign markets.

items.title: Korea Specialization
items.description: We continued to develop technology in Korea. Nearly 90% of projects came from this market.

items.title: Globalization
items.description: Hitek provides software outsourcing services and software products for customers from USA, Canada, Germany, Korea, Australia, Japan.

mission.title: Next Mission
mission.description: Continue expanding to new markets, enhance AI and advanced technology research, constantly improve service quality to become reliable global technology partner.

headercompany.title: HITEK SOFTWARE IMPLEMENTS CSR
headercompany.description: CSR stands for Corporate Social Responsibility, which is considered a popular trend worldwide, becoming a 'soft' requirement for businesses. To fulfill the obligations that a business and related individuals must perform for society to achieve the most positive impacts and minimize negative impacts on society. Hitek Software has been implementing the following items:

items.title: First
items.subtitle: Economic
items.description: Includes satisfying social needs, increasing social welfare, ensuring business existence and development.

items.title: Second
items.subtitle: Legal
items.description: Business must fully comply with legal regulations for stakeholders, including shareholders, consumers, employees' families.

items.title: Third
items.subtitle: Ethical
items.description: Behaviors and activities that society expects from businesses, but are not regulated in the legal system.

items.title: Fourth
items.subtitle: Humanitarian
items.description: Business should implement behaviors demonstrating desire to contribute to community and society.

footer.title: Commitment to sustainable development
footer.description: Hitek Software continuously strives to implement social responsibility in all business activities, aiming for sustainable development and positive contributions to the community.

header.title: Sustainable Development Goals
paragraphs: Hitek Software has been establishing a global operational network, therefore we always focus on work quality at every step and stage.
Hitek's leadership also cares deeply about employees' lives, so we aim for appropriate goals within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Hitek Software believes that we will help improve quality of life, and we will continue to strive to realize a new modern society that is smarter and happier.

goals.title: Quality Education
goals.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
goals.hitekAction: Hitek Software regularly organizes training sessions for employees on programming knowledge and necessary soft skills for everyone during work.

goals.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
goals.description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation.
goals.hitekAction: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation.

goals.title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
goals.description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation.
goals.hitekAction: Always create conditions for employees to work in an environment with the best quality infrastructure facilities.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.description: Through implementing sustainable development goals, Hitek Software not only contributes to the local community but also creates positive impact on a global scale.

aboutSection.heading: Thank you for customers' trust
aboutSection.subheading: Our journey is built on trust and cooperation from global partners, delivering excellent technology solutions and superior customer experience.
aboutSection.title: Your reliable technology partner
aboutSection.description1: HITEK is a leading technology company in Vietnam, specializing in providing software solutions and digital transformation services. With an experienced expert team and advanced technology, we are committed to delivering high-quality products.
aboutSection.description2: Our mission is to drive creativity, accelerate innovation, partner development and elevate success for every business.
aboutSection.ctaDescription: Let us help you realize your ideas with optimal technology solutions

stats.experienceDesc: Many years of experience have given us extensive knowledge across various industries, allowing us to provide the best digital experience solutions.
stats.clientsDesc: Over 80 global clients from around the world, including Korea, Japan, Canada, Australia and many others.
stats.projectsDesc: Projects completed for customers, delivering superior digital transformation experience and optimal solutions.
stats.teamDesc: Talented team including digital experts, strategic thinkers, designers and creative developers.
